dataSet.name: DataSet1

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN "Beginning Balance" ELSE Recorder END

parameter.name: BeginOfFiscalYear
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN MONTH(&Period.EndDate) >= Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() THEN DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 1) ELSE DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 2) END

parameter.dcsat:name: AmountRCTurnover
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsPayable) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentLiability) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.LongTermLiability) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Equity) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome) THEN -AmountRCTurnover ELSE AmountRCTurnover END

parameter.dcsat:name: AmountRCClosingBalance
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsPayable) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentLiability) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.LongTermLiability) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Equity) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income) OR Account.AccountType = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome) THEN -AmountRCClosingBalance ELSE AmountRCClosingBalance END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")
